de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.datastructure
Class Word

java.lang.Object
  de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.datastructure.Word
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Word>
public class Word
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Word>

A word stores information about one word in a text (content form, agreement features). Each word as a unique id which refers to the exact position in the text.

Word

public Word(java.lang.String stringForm,
            int sentence,
            int wordPosition,
            java.lang.String id)
Initialize a new Word object with the following information:

Parameters:
stringForm - String representation (Token).
sentence - Sentence position of the word.
wordPosition - Word position within the sentence.
id - Unique id for the word (usually extracted from MMAX-file).

Word

            int absolutePosition)
This constructor should be used in general.

Parameters:
stringForm - String form representation.
absolutePosition - Absolute position in text (counted in characters).

setRelativeWordPosition

public void setRelativeWordPosition(int sentenceNumber,
                                    int wordPosition)
Setter for relative position.

Parameters:
sentenceNumber - The number of the sentence this word is located in.
wordPosition - the relative position of the word within its sentence.

getXmlId

Getter for the XML id of a word.

Returns:

Getter for the position of a word in a sentence.

Getter for the absolute position of a word.

Setter for the absolute position of a word.

Parameters:
absolute - the absolute position of this word counted in characters from the beginning of the text.
